question: ”Hindus and Muslims form one nation in India. They are two eyes of India; Injure one and you injure the other ” whose thoughts were these?
explanation: Sir Sayed Ahmad Khan, was a philosopher of 19th century British India and an Islamic reformer. According to him "Hindus and Muslims form one nation in India. They are two eyes of India; Injure one and you injure the other". He founded the Scientific Society of Aligarh, the first scientific association.
